Record social position of a person: worker; it is only necessary to record the SP of persons who were reading; not of those who are only authors in our data-set such as Shakespeare or Lu Xun

Reference to text in which a reading is recorded; for person entries for authors of autobiographical texts or of academic texts, this can be left empty
